answers.answer: Um are you swelling at all?? Ive heard that vision changes can be a sign of pre ecclampsia... You might call your dr about it and get checked it.

It has been happening to me and passing out. Only the last few days. Doctor sent me to my neurologist and,he said,it was because my blood pressure was low and I am severely anemic. This was my case, but you might be different so ask your doctor. Being pregnant we have increased blood volume.
There are a few things that can affwct your vision.... it is a major indicator of preeclampsia, but it can also mean your anemic, your blood sugar is too low, or your eyes could be excessively dry...

That is a sign of pre eclampsia. Tell your doctor asap, so they can check for protein in your urine. That happened to me. I was out shopping for a car seat & all of a sudden I starting seeing spots in my vision. Went I got to the hospital, not only was there protein in my urine but my blood pressure was 200 over 180. They induced me on the spot. They most likely won't induce you yet, but they may give you something to help slow down your symptoms. It's best to call your doctor to be on the safe side.

I've had that for the past week or so. I just had a doctors appointment Monday and found out that the baby is turned up against my spine which is causing a decrease of blood flow to my heart. And having that makes the floaters appear. Along with mine if it gets really bad is feeling like I'm going to pass out and light headed. He told me when that happens to lay on my left side and drink some water. It's helped me some. The baby just happens to lay up against my spine quite often. It can get scary :(You may have something different. I would bring it up to your doctor.
Thxs ladies. My prenatal checkups have always been normal every month and I havent been swelling but things can change. I will make sure I talk to my doctor.

question: I am 31 & 5 weeks pregnant and all of a sudden these past couple of days I have been seeing floaties in my vision. It doesnt happen all the time but its annoying. Is it due to my pregnancy? Has anyone else noticed this in their vision?
title: Has this happened to anyone else?
